hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:Allah's Messenger (S) said: "Indeed the Shaitan comes to one of you in his Salat confusing him until he does now know how much he has prayed. When one of you experiences that then let him perform two prostrations while sitting

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يُصَلِّي فَيَشُكُّ فِي الزِّيَادَةِ وَالنُّقْصَانِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Has Doubts Over Addition Or A Omission
